edge_1: hired to recover missing money, Chigurh searches Moss' trailer home using his bolt pistol to blow out the door lock
edge_2: Moss retrieves the case from the Rio Grande and arranges to meet Carla Jean at a motel in El Paso, where he plans to give her the money and hide her from danger.
edge_3: Chigurh waits in the bedroom. Chigurh says he must fulfill his vow, but offers a coin toss as a compromise. Carla Jean refuses to call it, saying that he will be responsible for her fate.
